definitions.definition: Hot enough to make a hissing sound.
Brought to the table in the metal dish it has been cooked in, making such a sound.
labels: in the names of dishes in Asian cuisine etc.
definitions.label_groups: in the names of dishes in Asian cuisine etc.

definitions.definition: Exciting and intensely emotional or sexual .

examples: The two teams played a sizzling match.

main_definition: Hot enough to make a hissing sound.
secondary_definitions: ( in the names of dishes in Asian cuisine etc. ) Brought to the table in the metal dish it has been cooked in, making such a sound.
( informal ) Exciting and intensely emotional or sexual .
